availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George B. Boston (Green County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Green Country, Kentucky, native. Son of William Boston and Martha Boston. Married to Rachel A. Cage Boston in Barren County, Kentucky, on October 27, 1858. Father of Martha C. Boston. Married to May Francis Kidd Boston in Green County on December 25, 1864. Resident of Green County in 1850. Farmer in Hart County in 1860. Served in the 30th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private and sergeant from February 19, 1864, April 18, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 84A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, District 1, p. 734.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Precinct 3, p. 468B.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers Who Served in Organizations From the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0398.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994027, Barren County Marriages.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 116-58-25084.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Green County Marriages, Film 001877085.
"George Blakely 'G.B.' Boston (1834-1901)," Find A Grave, Memorial 91634169, accessed February 2, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/91634169.
